entities.name: Harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as noticing people whispering to each other and trying to act nonchalant.

entities.name: Luna
entities.description: A student who drifted away from the Ravenclaw table.

entities.name: Ginny
entities.description: A fourth-year student who was hailed by her fellow students and left to sit with them.

entities.name: Ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who found a seat together at the Gryffindor table.

entities.name: Hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who found a seat together at the Gryffindor table.

entities.name: Neville
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who found a seat together at the Gryffindor table.

entities.name: Nearly Headless Nick
entities.description: The Gryffindor House ghost who sat next to Harry and his friends.

entities.name: Parvati Patil
entities.description: A student who gave Harry an airy greeting.

entities.name: Lavender Brown
entities.description: A student who gave Harry an airy greeting.

relationships.description: Harry noticed people whispering to each other as he passed.
Luna drifted away from the Ravenclaw table.
Ginny was hailed by her fellow students and left to sit with them.
Harry, Ron, Hermione, and Neville found seats together at the Gryffindor table.
